name: Hydro Rage
author: MysticSpyral
notes: Turbo whales FTW. I built this similar to @BuiltToTilt - SSA Expert 's deck except I took out a legendary ocean and warrior of atlantis and replaced them with curse of anubis and gishki chains. Fishborg + econ take plays let me finish games early while gishki chain helped order the cards in the deck in order to get the right top decks and for fast whale plays with fishborg.
